1: O Lord, who may live in Your tent? Who may live on Your holy hill?
2: He who walks without blame and does what is right and good, and speaks the truth in his heart.
3: He does not hurt others with his tongue, or do wrong to his neighbor, or bring shame to his friend.
4: He looks down upon a sinful person, but honors those who fear the Lord. He keeps his promises even if it may hurt him.
5: He gives money to be used without being paid for its use. And he does not take money to hurt those who are not guilty. He who does these things will never be shaken.
